name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a friendly and curious cat, perfect for a family.

name: Barky
description: Barky is an energetic dog who loves outdoor activities.

name: Fluffy
description: Fluffy is calm and affectionate, ideal for a quiet home.

description: Shadow is loyal and protective, a great guard dog.

name: Spot
description: Spot is playful and loves children, an excellent family pet.

description: Mittens is shy but warms up quickly, loves to snuggle.

description: Buddy is calm and gentle, perfect for a quiet household.

description: Daisy is cheerful and sociable, loves playing fetch.

name: Tiger
description: Tiger is independent but enjoys company, a large and fluffy friend.

name: Max
description: Max is a relaxed and loyal companion, perfect for a family.

name: Oscar

name: Bella
description: Bella is playful and sweet, loves attention and companionship.
